original_text: And he made the table of shittim wood: two cubits was the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof, and a cubit and a half the height thereof:
korean_text: 그가 또 조각목으로 상을 만들었으니 길이가 두 규빗, 너비가 한 규빗, 높이가 한 규빗 반이며

sentences.original_text: And he made the table of shittim wood:
two cubits was the length thereof,
and a cubit the breadth thereof,
and a cubit and a half the height thereof:
sentences.korean_translation: 그 높이는 한 규빈 반 이었습니다.
